data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 2, Free kick Cincinnati.
Jurgen Locadia's header is off-target for Cincinnati.
Goal kick for New York City at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 5, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City pushes forward through Heber, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
In the minute 9, Cincinnati are pushing forward but Jurgen Locadia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
New York City are caught offside.
In the minute 14, New York City's Heber misses with an attempt on goal.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Jurgen Locadia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, New York City have a goal kick.
Cincinnati are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to New York City.
Jesus Medina of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 21, Heber (New York City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Free kick New York City.
New York City are whistled for offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Maxi Moralez for New York City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 29, Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maxi Moralez is back on the pitch.
Gary Mackay Steven (New York City) has replaced the possibly injured Maxi Moralez.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Cincinnati have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
New York City takes a corner from the right.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
New York City take a 1-0 lead thanks to Alexander Ring.
Great play from Gary Mackay Steven to set up the goal.
In the minute 41, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
New York City takes a corner from the left.
New York City's Jesus Medina misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, New York City drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
New York City are pushing forward but Alexander Ring's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 45, Free kick Cincinnati.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 47, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati are caught offside.
In the minute 51, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kendall Waston (Cincinnati) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Anton Tinnerholm.
In the minute 57, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
New York City to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
In the minute 58, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexander Ring is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 61, Alexander Ring for New York City is back on the field again.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Cincinnati make their second substitution with Nick Hagglund replacing Siem de Jong.
Allan Cruz is on a sub for Yuya Kubo for Cincinnati.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 67, Cincinnati's Joseph-Claude Gyau is on target but unsuccessful.
Cincinnati are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cincinnati drive upfield and Jurgen Locadia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Cincinnati are whistled for offside.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for New York City at Red Bull Arena.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brandon Vazquez is on a sub for Caleb Stanko for Cincinnati.
In the minute 74, Brandon Vazquez puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
New York City are whistled for offside.
Cincinnati are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 78, Free kick Cincinnati.
Jurgen Locadia (Cincinnati) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
James Sands (New York City) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Cincinnati takes a corner from the left.
Cincinnati push upfield and Kendall Waston gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert New York City defence.
Maxime Chanot is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 84, New York City's Maxime Chanot is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick Cincinnati.
Maxime Chanot (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, New York City make their second substitution with Valentin Castellanos replacing Heber.
Ismael Tajouri is on a sub for Jesus Medina for New York City.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Cincinnati.
New York City have a goal kick.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Free kick New York City.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in New York City.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Mathieu Deplagne (Cincinnati) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
New York City make their fourth substitution with Tony Rocha replacing Gary Mackay Steven.
